mapper.select: select rownum as rno, deposit_UID, fk_idx, depositcoin, deposit_status, deposit_type, deposit_date, fk_payment_UID from ( select deposit_UID, fk_idx, depositcoin, decode(deposit_status, 0, '사용완료', 1, '충전', 2, '차액환불', 3, '출금', -1, '입금대기') as deposit_status , deposit_type, to_char(deposit_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as deposit_date, fk_payment_UID from deposit where fk_idx = #{fk_idx} and depositcoin != 0 order by deposit_UID desc )
mapper.insert:
insert into petcare(care_UID, fk_pet_UID, fk_caretype_UID, care_contents, care_memo, care_start, care_end, care_alarm, care_date) values
( seq_petcare_UID.nextval, #{item.B}, #{item.C, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.D}, #{item.E}, #{item.F}, #{item.G}, #{item.H}, to_char(to_date(#{item.G}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') - #{item.H}*1/24/60, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') )
